name: Kevin Garnett
description: 6'11" power forward/center, fiercely intense competitor. Known for his intensity, trash-talking, and versatility. Defensive stalwart with a unique blend of skill and passion.

anything-is-possible.name: Anything Is Possible!
anything-is-possible.expression: unbridled joy, cathartic release, pure elation
anything-is-possible.prompt: Kevin Garnett screaming at the top of his lungs immediately after winning the 2008 NBA Championship - pounding his chest with both fists, face contorted with unfiltered emotion, eyes wide with overwhelming joy and relief, surrounded by celebrating teammates, the culmination of a lifelong dream realized

defensive-stance.name: Defensive Intensity
defensive-stance.description: Low stance, arms wide, intense stare
defensive-stance.prompt: Kevin Garnett in a low, wide defensive stance - knees bent, arms extended wide, palms facing forward, intensely focused gaze locked on the opponent, jaw clenched, showcasing his legendary defensive prowess and tenacity, ready to pounce, anticipation radiating from every muscle

post-fadeaway.name: Turnaround Fadeaway Jumper
post-fadeaway.prompt: Kevin Garnett executing his signature turnaround fadeaway jumper - body angled away from defender, high release point, ball leaving fingertips with perfect backspin, follow-through with arm extended, intense focus on the basket, defender reaching but unable to contest, showcasing his unique offensive repertoire

KG-Flex.name: KG Flex
KG-Flex.description: Flexing biceps, chest puffed out, screaming
KG-Flex.prompt: Kevin Garnett powerfully flexing his biceps after a big play - chest puffed out, screaming with unbridled intensity, veins popping, muscles rippling, demonstrating his sheer physical presence and competitive dominance, face conveying unwavering determination and aggressive competitiveness

talking-trash.name: Trash Talking
talking-trash.description: In opponent's face, animated trash talk
talking-trash.prompt: Kevin Garnett leaning into an opponent, engaging in intense trash talk - face inches away, animated hand gestures, eyes locked in a fierce stare, jaw clenched, displaying his legendary psychological warfare tactics and relentless competitive edge, words visibly sharp and cutting

pointing-skyward.name: Pointing Skyward
pointing-skyward.description: Looking up, pointing to the heavens
pointing-skyward.prompt: Kevin Garnett looking up towards the sky and pointing upwards with his index finger - a moment of reflection, potentially after a significant play or victory, conveying gratitude, remembrance, or spiritual connection, face showing respect and humility, a quiet pause amidst the intensity of the game.
